channel.title: CVE Feed for Fullworks -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fullworks -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-23974|2023-03-01T12:33:35.686Z -- fullworks -- quick%20event%20manager
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Fullworks Quick Event Manager plugin <= 9.7.4 affecting all registration actions (delete, delete all, edit, update).

item.title: CVE-2023-23889|2023-04-25T19:24:44.213Z -- fullworks -- quick%20paypal%20payments
item.description: Auth. (contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Fullworks Quick Paypal Payments plugin <= 5.7.25 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-23885|2023-04-07T11:46:31.395Z -- fullworks -- quick%20contact%20form
item.description: Auth. (contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Fullworks Quick Contact Form plugin <= 8.0.3.1 versions.

item.description: Unauth. Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Fullworks Quick Event Manager plugin <= 9.7.4 versions.

item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Fullworks Quick Paypal Payments plugin <= 5.7.25 versions.
